meanings.definition: Neuropterans: insects of the order Neuroptera, including lacewings and antlions.
meanings.sent1: Neuropterans are fascinating insects that belong to the Neuroptera order.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of neuropterans fluttering around the garden.
meanings.sent3: The neuropterans were having a party on the rose bush, wearing tiny hats.
meanings.sent4: The neuropterans danced in the air like delicate fairies.
meanings.sent5: The intricate wings of neuropterans shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Neuropterans: pertaining to or characteristic of neuropterans.
meanings.sent1: The neuropterans features on the insect's wings were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork was inspired by the delicate neuropterans she observed in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The neuropterans-themed party decorations were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: His neuropterans-like grace on the dance floor impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The neuropterans patterns on the fabric added a touch of elegance to the dress.
